name: Indika de Saram
bio: Samantha Indika de Saram (born September 2, 1973 in Matara), or Indika de Saram, is a former Sri Lankan cricketer, who played all format. He is a right-handed batsman and a right-arm off-break bowler who usually occupies the position of wicketkeeper. He is a past student of St. Thomas' College, Matara.
